laazotea.indi.client.examples

Class SimpleINDIClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.client.examples.SimpleINDIClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INDIDeviceListener, INDIPropertyListener, INDIServerConnectionListener

    public class SimpleINDIClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements INDIServerConnectionListener, INDIDeviceListener, INDIPropertyListener
    A simple INDI Client that listens to a particular INDI Server and prints any message received (listens to all possible events).
    Version:
    1.31, April 11, 2012
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]
